response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Considering its unparalleled quality and significance, we propose a purchase price of $750,000. We believe this offer reflects the true worth of the product while allowing for a fair transaction. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let us know, and we will arrange for further details. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
